page.title: 13FEAST/ST MAWGAN SPORTS
page.content: St Mawgan Feast Sports Committee run the Feast Sports on St James Moor known as the playing field. In the past the Longmoor was where the feast sports were held.It's held in the afternoon and evening of July 25th each year.St Mawgan CP School holds its annual sports day during the summer term.In the morning the play group uses part of the 70 metre track. In the afternoon the school uses the track for their races.There are 3 teams:Tolcarne,Lanherne and Carnanton. The older children have long distance, tug of war and sprint.The infants throw the bean bag.There is a presentation time when they give out a cup for the padder tennis:boys,girls and mixed doubles,then a shield for the boy or girl that tried hard at school work,sport etc.,then the big shield for the winning sports team.
